name: pg-promise-strict
description: postgresql with strict interpretation of promises
author: Codenautas <codenautas@googlegroups.com>

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-cov: set COVER=all&& istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-cov-odb: set COVER=odb&& istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-cov-ndb: set COVER=ndb&& istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
